summary: Replaces the default dagger sounds with new, high-quality sounds recorded with a real dagger.
descriptionHtml:
I made these sounds for a game project, but I decided to add them to Skyrim. After playing with the new sound effects and deciding I like them better, I've decided to release them for everyone else.

This will replace the default dagger sounds with custom sound effects. The new sounds were recorded with a real dagger, and edited with the highest degree of quality I could muster. I wanted them to remain realistic, but I also gave them a little added texture so they would be interesting to listen to.

The end result makes daggers sound smaller and "colder", much more fitting for small and discreet blades.

[u]Install/Uninstall[/u]
This mod is about as simple as possible, containing only two audio files. Just add the "sound" folder to Skyrim\Data (or use NMM), and the new audio will replace the default sounds.

Uninstallation is as simple as it is safe. Just delete the two audio files (located in "Skyrim\Data\sound\fx\wpn\blade1handsmall") and the default sounds will return, with no further effect on the game.
author: ReconditeArcanaTMG
